amendment.description: To provide a clarification with respect to the availability of funds for a voluntary contribution to the International Atomic Energy Agency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2008 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2008 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To provide a clarification with respect to the availability of funds for a voluntary contribution to the International Atomic Energy Agency.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2008 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2008 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Biden.
